title: Sakvikhia Waterfall
about: The Sakvikhia waterfall is located in the village of Atsana, in the Lanchkhuti Municipality, Guria, not far from the road leading from Atsana to Mamati village, in the gorge of the Atsanura river. The waterfall falls in steps onto the rocks and forms a small pond in a cave located on one of the platforms. The waterfall, amidst rocks, hidden in a green gorge, is a stunning sight. It is a perfect place for a picnic, to escape the summer heat and unwind in the tranquility of nature.
